sentence.Network_en: In chapter two , how Russell proved his topic of mathematics logicism is introduced in detail.

sentence.Network_en: The modern controversy between logicism and intuitionism arose, in fact, from disagreements over infinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上, 逻辑主义与直觉主义之间的现代论战是由关于无穷大的分歧引起的.
